resources.string: Welcome to CYMBYL - the smarter phone app that is going to help you Change Your Mind, so you can Better Your Life.
It is as simple as entering the new mantra you want to learn, then the frequency of the reminders, and hitting start.
Enter the new mental mantra that you want to learn in the box below. (maximum 150 characters)
Set how often and what times you will receive your daily mental script notifications.
Our app helps you develop new mental habits and effect lasting change in your life. Using positive affirmations through consistent reminders, CYMBYL keeps you on track towards a new you!

Create your own new mantra, select how often and how many times you want to be reminded and which hours of the day. CYMBYL does the rest! It focuses you on improving one habit at a time, so you can start building the better life you desire.
Everyone wants change - CYMBYL makes it easy.
